Title: Holiday
Writer: Donald Ogden Stewart (screenplay), Sidney Buchman (screenplay), Philip Barry (from the play by)
Actors: Katharine Hepburn, Cary Grant, Doris Nolan, Lew Ayres
Plot: A young man in love with a girl from a rich family finds his unorthodox plan to go on holiday for the early years of his life met with skepticism by everyone except for his fiancée's eccentric sister and long-suffering brother.
